# ipv4_ip2long (Function)

Convert an IPv4 address from dotted-decimal string form to its 32-bit integer representation.

## Example Usage

```terraform
output "ip_long" {
  value = provider::zeus::ipv4_ip2long("192.168.1.1")
}
```

## Signature

```text
ipv4_ip2long(ipv4_ip string) int
```
